Package index

Multiscale operations

MHM()
Multiscale Heterogenity Map
CMP()
Comparison Map Profile

Helper functions

kernel_square() kernel_circle() kernel_gaussian() kernel_plot()
Kernel helper functions
window_quick() window_broad() window_linearpixels()
Window helper functions
odd_floor()
Flooring to the closest odd number

MHM statistics for single landscapes

richness() simpson() shannon() shannon_evenness() kappa_index() contagion()
Summary metrics on a single raster

CMP statistics for pairs of landscapes

dist_euclidean() dist_manhattan() dist_chebyshev() dist_bhat() cor_pearson() diff_rmse() diff_mean() diff_median() diff_var() diff_cv() p_student() p_wilcoxon()
Summary metrics on a pair of rasters

Summarize and visualize MHM/CMP Results

p()
Monoscale plot after an MHM/CMP
ms_profile_df() ms_profile()
Profile method for MHM and CMP

Import/Export landscapes

import_example()
Import example files
import_raster()
Import image files to raster
import_txt() import_txt_grid()
Import text file into raster
export_raster()
Export raster to image format
export_txt() export_txt_grid()
Export raster to txt format

Simulate landscapes

simulate_continuous() simulate_voronoi()
Simulate categorical and contious landscapes

Raster and other helpers

raster_classes() raster_nclasses() raster_likely_categorical() raster_range() raster_ntot() raster_nNA() raster_anyNA() raster_declareNA() raster_summary() raster_resample() raster_rescale()
A collection of raster helpers to ease work with landscapes
se()
Standard error
gmean()
Geometric mean
